creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: half-circle footbridge in middle ground over calm water; small buildings at left and right; many people walking; gnarled tree with purple hanging blooms across top of image
marks: left margin, in black: [ 昭和十六年作　たいこ橋 ] LRC: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LLC in margin, in grey: [Half
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Half Moon Bridge
